text: The Articles of Association of our Company require that our Board shall comprise of not less than three Directors and not more than 15 Directors, provided that our Company may appoint more than 15 Directors after passing a special resolution. As of the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Board consists of eight Directors, comprising two Executive Directors, and six Non-Executive Director, of which there is one Non-Executive Chairman, one Nominee Director and four Non-Executive Independent Directors (including one woman Director). The Chairman of our Board, Pravin Agarwal, is a Non-Executive Director.
